text:
Have had their pizza a few times and have always been very happy.
We've even used leftover cinnamon knots to make fried pita chips in the morning with cream cheese! So good! â€¦More

name: Gordon Satoh
text: This is one of the best Papa John's pizza places I've ever been to.  After seeing Winter Jam at The Place, this Papa John's had just the right solution to our hunger.  Our pizza was out when they said it would be - hot, gooey, and no skimping on toppings.  I would highly recommend!

text: This place is slow, slow inside , slow delivery and your pizza is usually cold, kinda in the ghetto too, so when you go in to the store you will wait a while and you may get a hot Pizza, but delivery is usually just over an hour, ( even â€¦More
